name: BROCCOLI QUEST
description:
BROCCOLI QUEST was made as an exercise in one afternoon using Mosi, a simple HTML engine created by itch user Zenzoa. In Broccoli Quest you play as a strange long-nosed man who's run out of broccoli. Features include:

Giving sunglasses to a Goblin

Soothing a foul-mouthed pirate

Fumbling for broccoli in the dark

Game will run you about 5-10 minutes. Donate if you like, it helps me out :) ty <3
